meanings.sent1: She decided to overbleach her hair, but it turned out too light.
meanings.sent2: It is not good to overbleach clothes as it can damage the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The laundry room mishap resulted in an overbleached disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt to overbleach the stains away only made them more stubborn.
meanings.sent5: The warning label clearly stated not to overbleach the delicate items.

meanings.sent1: The overbleach shirt looked almost white from too much bleach.
meanings.sent2: The overbleach hair had a very light and unnatural color.
meanings.sent3: The overbleach walls made the room feel too bright and sterile.
meanings.sent4: Her overbleach skin glowed in the sunlight, looking almost translucent.
meanings.sent5: The overbleach towels felt rough and brittle from too many washes.
